amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to provide $150 billion in tax reductions; eliminate the marriage tax penalty; dedicate 50 percent of any additional surplus toward reduction in the national debt; increase defense spending by $56 billion; and set aside $275 billion for Social Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to limit funding growth to less that the rate of inflation; to designate 50 percent of any additional revenues toward tax relief and 50 percent toward the national debt; and to increase defense spending over five years to keep pace with the rate of inflation.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Neumann.
On agreeing to the Neumann amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 262 (Roll No. 208).
